lines.name: Terry
lines.text: This time avoiding the guard will not be so simple.

lines.name: Terry
lines.text: You need to retrieve the exit key from the desk then make your way to the exit.

lines.name: Terry
lines.text: And some advice, you can [color=#44ddff]sprint[/color] (the SHIFT key) to move faster, but it makes your footsteps louder as well.
